name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Chaos Delta SAGE 2022 demo
name_original: Sonic the Hedgehog: Chaos Delta SAGE 2022 demo
description:
What if... You fast forward 500 years to the future where everything in Mobius is futuristic and Sonic and Mecha Sonic join forces to stop the Universal Climax Corruption? Everything you think of Is true right now...

Nega Eggman has created a virus that will destroy Mobius and the multiverse called the Universal Climax Corruption. He's sent his Scorpion Fortress Gang to finish the job but Sonic and Mecha Sonic have teamed up and combined their DNA to transform into Neo Mecha Sonic to stop him. It's up to them to find Nega Eggman and end the corruption before it's too late.

Controller*


Keyboard

*To use the controller, you need to download Joy2Key and map the correct buttons shown above.
Get it here: https://joytokey.net/en/download

You can instantly play the demo online without downloading,
but you may experience low frame rates.
